steps: Verify that 'src/tui/Dashboard.tsx' exists and contains the split-screen layout logic.
Verify that dependencies 'ink', 'react', 'ink-select-input', and 'axios' were added to package.json.

To see the layout in action, you can temporarily use: npx ts-node -e "import React from 'react'; import { render } from 'ink'; import Dashboard from './src/tui/Dashboard'; render(<Dashboard sprintDir='sprints/sprint-03-tui-skills' />);" (requires experimental-specifier-resolution if using ESM, but we are using CJS dist/TS source)
Verify that 'src/utils/bridge.ts' now extends EventEmitter and emits 'block' and 'resolve' events.
Verify that 'src/tui/Dashboard.tsx' uses 'useInput' to capture guidance when a blocker is active.
Verify that 'bridge.resolveBlocker' now kills the active child process to trigger a restart.
